title: Korean State Railway
summary: The Korean State Railway (조선민주주의인민공화국 철도성,  Chosŏn Minjujuŭi Inmin Konghwaguk Ch'ŏldosŏng, commonly called 국철, Kukch'ŏl, "State Rail") is the operating arm of the Ministry of Railways of North Korea[1] and has its headquarters at P'yŏngyang. The current Minister of Railways is Chang Jun Song.
